item.description:
Jillian bowling for up to 40 people from 6-8pm (Event Part 1) and then billiards (pool) for up to 25 guests from 8-10pm (Event Part 2).

Also, included areÂ complimentary appetizers of free buffalo wings too. Please show up on time or early as we have to pick teams and start playing pool with or without you.

I made the RSVP higher since I know we will get no shows and last minute drop outs for the pool.

I am making this 2 separate events so PLEASE be sure to sign up for each separately.

Also, I am asking all members that do attend either of these 2 events to please chip in $5 (Only pay $5 even if you go to both events) since this is a event that is worth over $30 a person.

Thank You

Biagio
item.how_to_find_us: Meet for Billiards (pool) at Jillian's 2nd floor and ask for Biagio Social Fun Meetup
item.name: Jillian's billiards (pool) from 8-10pm (Event Part 2)
